title: Surface & Coatings 2022
description: ASEAN’s Most Comprehensive Technology & Solutions Exhibition for Surface Treatment, Paints, and Coatings – 8th Edition All-round Solutions for Perfecting Surface Treatment & Coatings Process Surface & Coatings 2022, the event for perfecting your Surface Treatment and Coatings Process, well-known for being the most comprehensive gathering of solutions and services of 415 brands from 25 countries. This event will be more exclusive by enabling you to tap into the opportunities to get in touch with many key experts, top executives, and manufacturers from a widest array of industries including auto-parts, electrical and electronics, food and beverage packaging, and metallurgy.
